column1: Smoque BBQ////Be prepared to stand in line
column2: and sometimes they are sold out of an item (mostly
column3: brisket).  Seating can best be called communal
column4: but that's not a bad thing at a BBQ joint.  Outside seating would be great in the summer
column5: but I'll not hold my breath on that.  Street parking is as good as it gets
column6: but I have always been lucky to find a spot.
